actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: Resolution to provide that the stationery allowances of Members of the House of Representatives may be used only for the operation of official offices of such Members.

summary.text: Directs that no Member of the House of Representatives may draw funds against the stationery allowance except for items related to the operation of any official office. Provides that any allowance not used by a former member shall be paid into the contingent fund of the House.

titles.title: Resolution to provide that the stationery allowances of Members of the House of Representatives may be used only for the operation of official offices of such Members.
